    module Test::Unit::TestResultOmissionSupport

    omissions[R]

    Public Instance Methods

    add_omission(omission) click to toggle source

    Records a Test::Unit::Omission.

    # File lib/test/unit/omission.rb, line 174
def add_omission(omission)
  @omissions << omission
  notify_fault(omission)
  notify_changed
end
    omission_count() click to toggle source

    Returns the number of omissions this TestResult has recorded.

    # File lib/test/unit/omission.rb, line 182
def omission_count
  @omissions.size
end

    initialize_containers() click to toggle source
    Calls superclass method 
    # File lib/test/unit/omission.rb, line 187
def initialize_containers
  super
  @omissions = []
  @summary_generators << :omission_summary
end
    omission_summary() click to toggle source 
    # File lib/test/unit/omission.rb, line 193
def omission_summary
  "#{omission_count} omissions"
end
